product_name: The North Face Storm Waterproof Hiking Boots - Girls'
long_description: A sturdy hiking boot with bursts of color your young adventurer will love, the girls' Storm Waterproof Hiking Boots from The North Face keep her feet snug and dry while she tackles tough trails. Split-suede and mesh uppers with HydroSeal(R) waterproof membranes provide durable, flexible coverage with plenty of breathability for comfort in warm weather. Gusseted tongue keeps out trail debris; toe bumpers and heel guards protect against impacts. Injection-molded EVA midsoles provide cushioning and support for long days on her feet. Durable rubber outsoles on the girls' Storm Waterproof Hiking Boots from The North Face offer excellent traction on a variety of surfaces.
short_description: A sturdy hiking boot with bursts of color your young adventurer will love, the girls' Storm Waterproof Hiking Boots from The North Face keep her feet snug and dry while she tackles tough trails.
